name: Synclavier Timbre File
summary: Learn about .STMB files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: You most likely will only encounter an STMB file if you use SynclavierX software. However, SynclavierX has been discontinued, making STMB files uncommon.
NOTE: SynclavierX is a program that emulates the capabilities of a Synclavier digital synthesizer, which was a physical music workstation manufactured from the 1970s to the 1990s.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
